N = int(input())
S, T = input().split()

string = ""
for i in range(N):
    string += S[i]
    string += T[i]
print(string)


N = int(input()) # 入力
S,T = input().split() # 入力

string = "" # 定義
for i in range(N): # 繰り返し
    string += S[i] # 追加
    string += T[i] # 追加
print(string) # 出力

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()
    res = ''
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[i]
        res += t[i]
    print(res)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()
    res = ''
    for i in range(n):
        res += s[i] + t[i]
    print(res)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
